meanings.definition: A covering for the ears, typically consisting of a curved band of padded material to cover the ears in cold weather.
meanings.sent1: I wore my earmuff to keep my ears warm in the snow.
meanings.sent2: She put on her earmuff before heading out into the chilly wind.
meanings.sent3: The earmuff looked like a cozy hug for my ears.
meanings.sent4: Her earmuff was a shield against the biting cold.
meanings.sent5: The earmuff felt like a soft cloud hugging my ears tightly.

meanings.definition: A device consisting of a pair of ear covers connected by a headband, worn to protect the ears from cold or noise.
meanings.sent1: The earmuff blocked out the loud construction noise.
meanings.sent2: He wore his earmuff to muffle the sound of the busy street.
meanings.sent3: The earmuff whispered secrets to his ears, keeping them safe.
meanings.sent4: Her earmuff was a silent guardian against the noisy world.
meanings.sent5: The earmuff was a barrier, shielding his ears from the chaos outside.
